title: Championship Mindset of a UFC Fighter w/ Michael Chandler
description:
Somebodyâ€™s got to be the bestâ€¦ why not YOU?

Michael Chandler is a UFC Top Competitor, and a person you can aspire to be like both in and out of the Octagon. Heâ€™s a 3x Bellator Lightweight Champion and is on his way to holding the UFC Lightweight title. He is a rising star, a good friend of mine, and truly one of the greats!

When you are locked in a cage staring in the face of an opponent that wants to rip your head off, it becomes just as much of a mental game as it is a physical one.

In this episode, Michael shares his secrets to preparing his mind for a WIN, eliminating the fear of failure, embracing failure, and being able to step fully into his purpose and his greatness!

No matter where you came from or how much of a slump you might be in, itâ€™s time for you to THINK DIFFERENTLY! Michael went 688 days in between wins before he became an â€œovernight success.â€ It was all about his mental ability to overcome imposter syndrome, and embrace his past while FIGHTING for his futureâ€¦ for who he was destined to become!

The strategies youâ€™ll learn in this interview will help you to accept your God-given imperfections and break free from the jail of self-doubt, how to create a mental highlight reel, and prepare your mind to win your next BIG FIGHT!

This is NOT just a SPORTS interview! Itâ€™s a master class on mental preparation, visualization and changing your mindsetâ€¦ Iâ€™m not exaggerating when I called a master class!

Donâ€™t miss Michaelâ€™s next BIG FIGHT. Itâ€™s the main event on PPV May 15th against Charles Oliveira.
